short_term_memory_strategy.title: Short Term Memory Strategy
short_term_memory_strategy.description: Strategy for managing short-term memory when context limit is reached. 'trim' removes oldest messages, 'summarize' creates summaries.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls creativity: higher values are more creative, lower values are more precise. CHANGING THIS SETTING MAY INTRODUCE UNEXPECTED BEHAVIOR. USE WITH CAUTION.

frequency_penalty.title: Frequency Penalty
frequency_penalty.description: Adjusts repetition: higher values encourage new topics, lower values allow repetition.

presence_penalty.title: Presence Penalty
presence_penalty.description: Controls topic focus: higher values promote diversity, lower values stay closely on topic.

telegram_entrypoint_enabled.title: Enable Telegram Communication
telegram_entrypoint_enabled.description: Allow agent to respond to Telegram messages

token.title: Bot Token
token.description: Telegram bot token obtained from BotFather

owner.title: Owner Username
owner.description: Owner of the bot, if set, you can receive notifications from the bot

whitelist_chat_ids.title: Whitelist Chat IDs
whitelist_chat_ids.description: List of chat IDs that are allowed to interact with the bot

greeting_user.title: User Greeting
greeting_user.description: Custom greeting message for individual users

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Please choose the Agent's skills carefully. Excessive skills will pollute the context and reduce the Agent's intelligence. Only select the necessary skills, and it is best not to exceed 10.
